meanings.definition: A person who draws plans or designs, especially one who prepares technical drawings.
meanings.sent1: The skilled draftsmen created detailed blueprints for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The draftsmen at the architecture firm worked tirelessly on the construction plans.
meanings.sent3: The draftsmen's drawings were so precise that even the smallest details were captured.
meanings.sent4: The draftsmen's pens danced across the paper, bringing the design to life.
meanings.sent5: Watching the draftsmen at work was like witnessing art in motion.
